reviews.review: This game is way more fun than expected. Lots of potential to have fun both solo and playing with friends. I wish I had found this game years ago. The game still has lots more potential, and there is plenty of room to enjoy it at all skill levels.
BEST GAME EVER. Especially with friends that try and get you killed :-).

Honestly really fun horror game to play, what kills it for me it that I can never play as a survivor because there are constant trolls teaming up against the killer. I don't mind that players want to play as a team, but this is out of control. I'm forced to always play as killer, if I want to play as a survivor, I have better chance of finishing every Nightmare on elm street movie before being able to join a game as survivor. It suck too that I got dlc for survivors such as Ash Williams that I'm not able to use because of this, which is not fair considering I paid for this. I want to give this game a like, but that fact that these issues go unresolved is unacceptable.

This game routinely generates some of the most unique and memorable player interactions in any game I've played. There is a lot of emotion conveyed in exactly how rapidly you get tea-bagged or pointed at.

It takes a very long time to get to have the perks and the experience required to even know if you like this one. If you like the idea of horror movie icons chasing Christmas elves through cornfields then this is the only place you're going to find it.

Play it casually (with friends as a survivor) and you'll probably see the fraying edges of the glaring balance issues, but they wont be consistently bothersome.

I play it because I like scaring people and chasing them around the neighborhood, but my parole officer told me to stop doing that.

É um jogo com uma ideia legal, tanto que comecei a jogar no console mas gostei tanto que comprei aqui também, os sistema de distribuição de jogadores maior parte das vezes se mostra se uma grande bagunça tendo jogadores que apenas entram para ferrar sua jogatina. Para os sobreviventes deveria ter uma passiva diferente para cada um porem seria uma porcentagem pequena do tipo 3% ou 5%, tenho certeza que isso ajudaria na venda de personagens, porque depois que você da prestigio 3 em todos os personagens sua gameplay só muda a aparência do boneco.
19/07/2022 a mudança que chegou ao DBD para mim e meus amigos matou o DBD como sempre mais uma atualização que tentaram equilibrar o jogo mais acabaram fazendo que o jogo fica mais benéfico para os assassinos (
stun mais rápido 'ridículo',
 ataque decisivo 'tinha uma chance de usar a partida toda agora inútil',
 dead hard 'só servia pra toma distancia pois não protegia a muitas atualizações',
 frio na espinha 'tempo de recarga serio? sendo que tinha gente que levava um agarram mesmo usando esta perk'
 bem tem tanta coisa que eu devia colocar aqui mas não vou estender).
boa sorte pra quem quiser jogar isso.

Однажды у одного мудреца спросили: "Зачем ты играешь в Dead by daylight? Всем ведь известно, что эта игра - убитая помойка". Мудрец ответил: "Чтобы предупредить остальных..."

Un très bon jeu en somme, surtout en y jouant à plusieurs ou même en partie perso. Une bonne expérience de jeu surival horreur asymétrique, vous prendrez aussi bien du plaisir à faire tourner en bourrique un tueur que de massacrer des petits survivants sans défenses. Une bonne étendue de compétences/objets et de personnages tous très distincts. Le jeu est très bien entretenu, du nouveau contenu est ajouté très souvent.
Pour les plus gros porte monnaies, des cosmétiques sont achetables (dont certain grâce à de la monnaie venant directement du jeu), un pass de "combat" est également disponible. Beaucoup de lore autour du jeu et des personnages a été créé et on en apprend d'avantage avec les nouvelles mises à jour. Jeu fortement conseillé bien évidemment.

Attention, ne vous mettez pas au jeu actuellement! Ces petits chenapants de chez Epic Games on mit le jeu gratuit, ce qui fait que le jeu est actuellement remplit disons... d'incapables!

I bought this game both on ps and steam, but I play it on ps and I've played it for about a month now. I have two level 50 survivors and a slightly leveled killer. 
This would be a really good multiplayer survival horror game, however it is spoiled by about a third of killers (that's being quite lenient) . Once every two or three games you'd get matched up with a killer that just camps one survivor at a time. This results in very poor and unenjoyable gameplay. If nothing changes I probably will stop playing because those players just ruin the game. And I'm not the only one saying this, I play with another person and they feel the same way and so do other people who they play with.
Right now I would not reccomend anyone playing this game, the enjoyable matches are too sparce.
Magnifico juego para jugar con amigos ( ME GUSTARIA QUE TENGA SOPORTE PARA 3 MONITORES )
I really enjoy the game play but the only thing that i really have an issue with is the down time to find a new match...

Dead by Daylight é um ótimo jogo tanto para você que gosta de jogar sozinho quanto para você que gosta de jogar com amigos.

Pontos positivos:
- Gráfico legal
- Divertido
- Variedade de personagens muito legal
- Cada killer possui um tipo de estratégia e jogabilidade
- Muitas formas de jogar (tanto de survivor quanto de killer)
- Fator replay muito forte (justifica minhas quase 500h)
- Possui personagens icônicos e muito bem desenvolvidos, com referências super bacanas e bem planejado
- Atualizações frequentes e novidades
- Map Design desafiador

Negativos
- Desbalanceamento de killers/survs
- Algumas perks absurdamente fortes, outras inúteis
- Killers altamente nerfados bem como Killers absurdamente buffados
- Bugs (Acredito que os hits quando se joga de killer são bem bugados, mas não são tantos)
- Pode ser frustrante em alguns momentos
- MMR desbalanceado
Хорошая игра, чтобы убить время или получить классные и позитивные эмоции. В соло катать тоже может быть  интересно и весело!

Hola, mi nombre es Javier Solano, tengo que decir que este juego me ha cambiado la vida. Antes, solía salir con mis amigos todos los días, pero descubrimos este juego, y nos viciamos a él, con lo que solo salíamos de vez en cuando ahora. Es un juego impresionante la verdad, tiene iconos del terror como Leatherface, Michael Myers, Ghostface...y muchos más. También el gameplay es bastante instintivo, y tu objetivo como asesino o superviviente está bien claro. El único problema es que los amigos con los que jugaba ya no son amigos míos, que les jodan, para la próxima que aprendan que no voy a ir a salvarlos contra un leatherface facecampeando, hijos de puta.

After a few years and many classic re- done RPGs I played recently I found a new favorite! If you are father with a full time job, kids and only have time for a match or two here or there - this is the right game for you! Warning! It's goddamn addictive! I have been playing mostly killers until I realized the other side of the coin is also fun and very well designed. Overall it's incredible fun and there's much more to explore, time and money well spent for certain :)
